## mixOscHOF variable

Similar to [mixOsc](./dsp.mixosc.md)<!-- -->, but with `mix` arg (\[0..1\] range) directly given to HOF and not changeable after.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mixOscHOF: (osc1: StatelessOscillator, osc2: StatelessOscillator, mix?: number) => StatelessOscillator
```
